title: Login Page Not Displaying Error Messages
description: When user enters invalid credentials, the error message does not appear on the login page. The form just refreshes without any feedback to the user.
stepsToReproduce:
1. Go to login page
2. Enter invalid email
3. Enter wrong password
4. Click login button
5. Observe no error message appears

title: Shopping Cart Total Calculation Error
description: The shopping cart shows incorrect total when applying discount codes. The discount is not being properly calculated.
stepsToReproduce:
1. Add items to cart
2. Proceed to checkout
3. Apply discount code
4. Verify total calculation
5. Total shows incorrect amount

title: Mobile App Crashes on Transfer
description: The mobile banking app crashes when attempting to transfer large amounts between accounts.
stepsToReproduce:
1. Login to mobile app
2. Navigate to transfer
3. Enter amount over $10,000
4. Select accounts
5. App crashes when confirming

title: Product Search Returns Irrelevant Results
description: When searching for products, the search algorithm returns products that don't match the search criteria.
stepsToReproduce:
1. Go to product catalog
2. Search for 'electronics'
3. Results include clothing items
4. Search algorithm not filtering correctly

title: Appointment Confirmation Email Not Sent
description: After booking an appointment, patients are not receiving confirmation emails despite successful booking.
stepsToReproduce:
1. Login to patient portal
2. Book an appointment
3. Complete booking process
4. Check email for confirmation
5. No email received

title: Account Balance Shows Incorrect Format
description: Account balance is displayed with incorrect currency formatting and decimal places.
stepsToReproduce:
1. Login to banking app
2. View account summary
3. Check balance format
4. Shows $1234.567 instead of $1,234.57

title: CRM Contact Search Not Working
description: The contact search functionality in CRM system returns no results even with valid contact names.
stepsToReproduce:
1. Login to CRM system
2. Navigate to contacts
3. Use search bar
4. Enter existing contact name
5. No results returned
